markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 107 4.0 **Trigger** An enemy damages your ally, and both are within 15 feet of you. --- Your foe hesitates under the weight of sin as visions of redemption play in their mind’s eye. The foe must choose one of the following options:
  • The ally is unharmed by the triggering damage.
  • The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. After the damaging effect is applied, the enemy becomes [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) until the end of its next turn.
name: Glimpse of Redemption
